name: He Will Rise
description:
This is my first experiment with game development. An idea executed with Bitsy.

Tools Used:
https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy
https://candle.itch.io/bitsy-audio

The background music is a track I wrote called Aether. Originally released as Three Chain Links. You can find the track here:
https://threechainlinks.bandcamp.com/track/aether
